title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 128.15 - Duties of sheriff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 128.15 - Duties of sheriff

State Regulations

The sheriff of each county may be
requested to assist the commissioner of jurors in implementing the provisions
of article 16 of the Judiciary Law as provided by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
128.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
